GetStartedPage.title2: donde los empresarios amplían su alcance
GetStartedPage.title3: a nuevos mercados con sus productos

card1.title: Gestión eficaz de los pedidos
card1.text: Realice y supervise pedidos en tiempo real. Manténgase al día sobre el progreso y el estado de los pedidos, en cualquier momento y lugar.

card2.title: Transparencia financiera
card2.text: Obtenga acceso instantáneo a las condiciones financieras y a los resultados de las transacciones realizadas en tiempo real, lo que le permitirá tomar decisiones con conocimiento de causa.

card3.title: Accesibilidad 24/7
card3.text: Acceda al sistema las veinticuatro horas del día y ahorre un tiempo valioso creando tickets cuando más le convenga. Disfrute de las ventajas de gestionar su cuenta sin necesidad de llamar por teléfono.

card4.title: Análisis perspicaces
card4.text: Acceda a informes vitales adaptados a sus necesidades. Personalice criterios y filtros para profundizar en los análisis que más le interesan.

card5.title: Descubrimiento rápido de productos
card5.text: Localice productos sin esfuerzo mediante herramientas de búsqueda intuitivas, filtros y vistas completas de productos.

waitingInfo.rejected: Lo sentimos mucho, pero su solicitud ha sido rechazada...

approvedLeadInfo.ndaModalTitle: Para acceder a nuestros precios, firme el Acuerdo de confidencialidad.

nda.ndaText: La información confidencial es cualquier tipo de información sobre la Parte que no esté disponible públicamente, que también haya sido transferida o haya llegado a conocimiento de la otra Parte de cualquier forma antes de la celebración del Acuerdo o durante la ejecución del mismo, así como cualquier otra información, incluida la información financiera (como los precios y márgenes de beneficio de la Parte) y/o que haya sido designada por la Parte como confidencial por escrito. Las Partes serán responsables del cumplimiento de las obligaciones de confidencialidad y tendrán prohibido revelar información confidencial a terceros. Por divulgación de información confidencial se entenderá la transferencia de información confidencial a terceros de cualquier forma. Si una de las Partes viola las obligaciones de confidencialidad, la Parte cuyos intereses hayan sido violados tendrá derecho a exigir la indemnización por daños y perjuicios y una multa de 10.000,00 euros.
nda.ndaCheckbox: He revisado detenidamente el Acuerdo de confidencialidad y acepto sus términos y condiciones.

PrivacyPolicy.item1-1-1: The purpose of this “Privacy Policy” (hereinafter - Privacy Policy) is to provide a Data Subject with information on purpose, legal basis, scope, terms of processing, protection measures performed by WAPI OÜ, as well as on the Data Subject's rights in relation to Personal Data processing.
PrivacyPolicy.item1-1-2: Additional information on processing of Personal Data may be included in agreements, confidentiality notices and other documents, as well as on the WAPI OÜ websites.
PrivacyPolicy.item1-2: This Privacy Policy applies to WAPI OÜ.
PrivacyPolicy.item1-3: WAPI OÜ takes care of the privacy of Data Subjects and protection of Personal Data, observing the Data Subjects' right to the lawfulness of Personal Data Processing in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation and applicable national and other regulatory enactments in the field of privacy and Personal Data Processing.
PrivacyPolicy.item1-4: WAPI OÜ has implemented appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect Personal Data from unauthorized access, unlawful disclosure, accidental loss, alteration, destruction or any other unlawful processing.
PrivacyPolicy.item1-5: Personal Data is obtained directly from the Data Subject and from services used by Data Subject (e.g. in the Electronic Commerce System), as well as from external sources (e.g. public registers or databases) or other persons (e.g. legal entity represented by the Data Subject, or whose employee, official, beneficial owner he/she is). WAPI OÜ may record telephone conversations, video and / or audio, save e-mail communication or otherwise document the Data Subject's interaction and communication with WAPI OÜ.
PrivacyPolicy.item2: Terms and abbreviations used in the Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.item2-1: Processing - is any action or set of operations performed with or without automated means on Personal Data or on sets of Personal Data, such as collection, registration, organization, structuring, storage, adaptation or modification, recovery, viewing, use, disclosure by dispatching, distributing or otherwise making available, coordination, combination, restriction, erasure or destruction.
PrivacyPolicy.item2-2: Data Processor - is a natural or legal person, public authority, agency or another body that processes Personal Data on behalf of the Data Controller.
PrivacyPolicy.item2-3: Data Controller - WAPI OÜ that processes Personal Data of the Data Subject in accordance with the specified purposes and means of Personal Data Processing.
PrivacyPolicy.item2-4: Data Subject - WAPI OÜ potential, current, former client - natural person, employment candidate, visitor, websites (incl. Electronic Commerce System) visitor and user, participant of events organized by WAPI OÜ, employee of legal entities (for example, WAPI OÜ customers, business partners, tenants, etc.), official, contact person, authorized person, beneficial owner and any other identified or identifiable natural person, whose Personal Data is Processed by WAPI OÜ.
PrivacyPolicy.item2-5_1: Electronic Commerce System - WAPI OÜ Electronic commerce system used by respective WAPI (
PrivacyPolicy.item2-6: WAPI OÜ - fulfillment, marketplace and courier aggregator “WAPI OÜ” reg. No.14699305, legal address: Harju maakond, Tallinn, Mustamäe linnaosa, Kadaka tee 7, 12915
PrivacyPolicy.item2-7: WAPI OÜ - it is company doing business in the territories of the European Union and the European Economic Area.
PrivacyPolicy.item2-8: Personal Data - any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person (Data Subject).
PrivacyPolicy.item2-9: General Data Protection Regulation - Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council on the protection of individuals with regard to the Processing of Personal Data and on the free movement of such data and repealing Directive 95/46 / EC.
PrivacyPolicy.item3-1: WAPI OÜ may be a Data Controller, Data Processor or Joint Controller when processing Personal Data of the Data Subject.
PrivacyPolicy.item3-2: Data Controller is such WAPI OÜ that has at its disposal obtained Personal Data of the Data Subject, for example, on the basis of a contractual relationship or before establishment of a contractual relationship, by submitting an application to the Data Subject or visiting WAPI OÜ premises or otherwise.
PrivacyPolicy.item3-3_1: The contact information of WAPI OÜ, as well as website address of the company, is available at:
PrivacyPolicy.item4-1: WAPI OÜ processes Personal Data mainly for the following purposes:
PrivacyPolicy.item4-1-3: for registration of a client in the Electronic Commerce System, for ensuring operation of the Electronic Commerce System and for improvement of operation;
PrivacyPolicy.item4-1-4: for placing orders, delivery of goods, fulfillment of product warranty obligations;
PrivacyPolicy.item4-1-6: for identification of client / Data Subject;
PrivacyPolicy.item4-1-8: for WAPI OÜ activities, incl. to ensure administrative, accounting and archival functions;
PrivacyPolicy.item4-1-9: to ensure the course of WAPI OÜ personnel selection process and to ensure legal interests of WAPI OÜ insofar as they are related to the personnel selection;
PrivacyPolicy.item4-1-10: for implementation of rights of WAPI OÜ;
PrivacyPolicy.item4-1-11: for WAPI OÜ marketing activities (e.g. submission of information and offers, organization of events for business partners / employees and their family members and their coverage in the media and social networks, promotion of recognition of WAPI OÜ image);
PrivacyPolicy.item4-1-12: for video surveillance in the respective WAPI OÜ's premises, warehouses and territories;
PrivacyPolicy.item4-1-13: for prevention and detection of criminal offenses;
PrivacyPolicy.item4-1-14: for obtaining and preservation of evidence in civil disputes;
PrivacyPolicy.item4-1-15: for reviewing applications / complaints and other documents;
PrivacyPolicy.item4-1-16: for other purposes in legally justified cases.
PrivacyPolicy.item4-2: In any of cases referred to in Clause 4.1 of the Privacy Policy, WAPI OÜ Processes Personal Data to the extent permitted by the specific purpose of Personal Data Processing and in accordance with the procedures required and permitted by applicable laws and regulations.
PrivacyPolicy.item5: Legal basis for Personal Data processing
PrivacyPolicy.item5-1: WAPI OÜ processes Personal Data on the basis of the following legal grounds:
PrivacyPolicy.item5-1-1: For conclusion and execution of an agreement - Personal Data Processing is performed to ensure conclusion of an agreement, provision of services / sale of goods, settlement process or resolution of issues arising from the concluded agreement, as well as for taking measures before conclusion of an agreement;
PrivacyPolicy.item5-1-2: In order to fulfill legal obligation - Personal Data Processing is necessary for WAPI OÜ to fulfill obligation specified in regulatory enactments, for example, in relation to administrative, accounting, archival requirements, anti-money laundering and terrorist financing prevention regulations and compliance with international sanctions, as also in order to fulfill the requests of law enforcement, supervisory and other institutions in the amount and in accordance with the procedures provided for in regulatory enactments;
PrivacyPolicy.item5-1-3: In order to implement or defend legitimate interests - on this basis Personal Data is processed, for example, for prevention and detection of criminal offenses related to the protection of property, as well as for obtaining and preserving evidence in civil disputes (video surveillance), debt collection, prevention of loss, for protection of WAPI OÜ rights and interests of WAPI OÜ clients, business partners, promotion of WAPI OÜ image recognition. Based on the legitimate interests of WAPI OÜ, Personal Data is also processed within the WAPI OÜ personnel selection process. In such cases, it is assessed that the Privacy of a Data Subject will not be harmed within the Processing.
PrivacyPolicy.item5-1-4: Consent - in some cases WAPI OÜ requires consent to the Processing of Personal Data. In such cases, Data Subject will be informed separately about specific purpose of the Processing. Data Subject may withdraw the consent at any time.
PrivacyPolicy.item5-1-5: Public interests - in certain cases Processing of Personal Data of Data Subjects may be performed on the basis of general public interest. In most cases, these may be exceptional cases when Processing of Personal Data needs to be carried out in connection with unforeseen threats to the public or a specific Data Subject, for example, in connection with the spread of COVID-19.
PrivacyPolicy.item6: Categories of personal data and their types
PrivacyPolicy.item6-1: The amount and categories of Personal Data to be processed depend on the purpose of the Processing, which may differ in different situations. WAPI OÜ mainly processes the following categories and types of Personal Data:
PrivacyPolicy.item6-1-1: Identification data, such as personal identification code, date of birth, data of identity documents, incl. photo;
PrivacyPolicy.item6-1-2: Contact information, such as address, phone number, email address;
PrivacyPolicy.item6-1-3: Data on the use of Electronic Commerce System, for example, data on accesses and usernames and passwords assigned in the Electronic Commerce System, purchased goods, activities performed in the environment of the Electronic Commerce System, usage habits;
PrivacyPolicy.item6-1-4: Financial data, for example, information on execution of customer payments in connection with the goods sold by WAPI OÜ;
PrivacyPolicy.item6-1-5: Account details, such as bank account number;
PrivacyPolicy.item6-1-6: Reliability and research data, such as data on counterparty payment discipline, data enabling WAPI OÜ to conduct customer research activities related to prevention of money laundering and terrorist financing and to verify compliance with international sanctions, including the purpose of cooperation and whether a business partner, its representative, real beneficiary is a politically significant person;
PrivacyPolicy.item6-1-7: Data obtained and / or created in the course of performing duties provided for in regulatory enactments, for example, data that WAPI OÜ is obliged to provide to such institutions as tax authorities, courts, law enforcement authorities;
PrivacyPolicy.item6-1-8: Communication and device data, such as data contained in messages, e-mails, videos, photographs and / or audio recordings, as well as other types of communication and interaction data collected when the Data Subject visits WAPI OÜ premises (incl. using a pass issued by WAPI OÜ) and organized events or contacted a Data Subject, and data related to the Data Subject's WAPI OÜ website (incl. visits to Electronic Commerce Systems);
PrivacyPolicy.item6-1-9: Professional data, such as data on education or professional career;
PrivacyPolicy.item6-1-10: Special category Personal Data, such as data on suitability of a job vacancy candidate for the position to be held.
PrivacyPolicy.item7-1: For the protection of Personal Data, WAPI OÜ uses various technical and organizational security measures to protect Personal Data from unauthorized disclosure, access, loss, erasure, destruction (e.g. data encryption, anti- burglary equipment, firewalls, security passwords, etc.).
PrivacyPolicy.item7-2: Personal Data is available to a limited number of employees of WAPI OÜ and involved Data Processors, who need it for performance of the respective official functions / tasks, and who have binding confidentiality requirements.
PrivacyPolicy.item8-1: WAPI OÜ may transfer Personal Data to persons to whom WAPI OÜ has the right to disclose them (for example, Data Processors, legal service providers, etc.) or has an obligation in accordance with regulatory enactments or concluded agreements, or if the Data Subject's consent has been obtained.
PrivacyPolicy.item8-2: WAPI OÜ may transfer Personal Data mainly to the following recipients:
PrivacyPolicy.item8-2-1: to another WAPI OÜ, if relevant processes related to the Processing of Personal Data within WAPI OÜ are provided by the relevant company or in other cases when it is permitted by regulatory enactments;
PrivacyPolicy.item8-2-2: institutions and officials, such as supervisory authorities, tax authorities, law enforcement authorities, sworn bailiffs, sworn notaries, courts, out-of-court dispute resolution institutions;
PrivacyPolicy.item8-2-3: credit and financial institutions, insurance service providers, third parties involved in the execution of transactions, settlements and reporting;
PrivacyPolicy.item8-2-5: providers of information systems and databases;
PrivacyPolicy.item8-2-6: debt collection service providers, assignees, insolvency administrators;
PrivacyPolicy.item8-2-7: other persons and suppliers related to the provision of services to WAPI OÜ, incl. video surveillance, IT, telecommunications, archiving, postal service providers, etc.
PrivacyPolicy.item8-3: WAPI OÜ does not regularly or systematically transfer Personal Data to third countries (countries outside the European Union and the European Economic Area), however, Personal Data may be processed by Data Processors located in third countries (for example, technical solution developers or service providers). In this case, when transferring Personal Data, WAPI OÜ ensures the procedures provided for in regulatory enactments to ensure a level of Personal Data Processing and protection equivalent to the General Data Protection Regulation.
PrivacyPolicy.item9: Duration of storage of Personal Data
PrivacyPolicy.item9-1: WAPI OÜ does not store Personal Data for longer than it is necessary for the respective purpose of Personal Data Processing, or longer than specified in the binding regulatory enactments.
PrivacyPolicy.item9-2: The period of storage of Personal Data depends on the purpose for which Personal Data has been obtained and whether the period of storage is provided for in regulatory enactments.
PrivacyPolicy.item9-3: WAPI OÜ shall determine the term of Personal Data Processing taking into account, inter alia, the end date of the business relationship, withdrawal of the Data Subject's consent to Personal Data Processing and the statutory period during which WAPI OÜ or the Data Subject may exercise its legitimate interests (e.g. submit objections and complaints or bring an action).
PrivacyPolicy.item10-1: WAPI OÜ does not perform profiling and automated decision-making in relation to the Data Subject.
PrivacyPolicy.item11-1: WAPI OÜ use cookies on their websites. The cookies used and information about them are available in the WAPI OÜ Cookie Policy, which is available on the website of the WAPI OÜ.
PrivacyPolicy.item12-1: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation, the Data Subject has the following rights with regard to the processing of his / her Personal Data:
PrivacyPolicy.item12-1-1: To receive confirmation whether the respective WAPI OÜ processes Personal Data of the Data Subject and, if it processes, also to access them.
PrivacyPolicy.item12-2: To request correction of the Data Subject's Personal Data if they are inappropriate, incomplete or incorrect (Data Subject has no right to request correction or supplementation of video recordings, as this would be considered as falsification or distortion of information):
PrivacyPolicy.item12-2-1: to request deletion of Personal Data of the Data Subject;
PrivacyPolicy.item12-2-2: to restrict Processing of Personal Data of the Data Subject;
PrivacyPolicy.item12-2-3: To object to the Processing of Personal Data of the Data Subject, if Processing takes place on the basis of legitimate interests of WAPI OÜ;
PrivacyPolicy.item12-2-4: to receive Personal Data submitted by a Data Subject to the relevant WAPI OÜ and processed on the basis of consent or performance of the contract in a structured form in one of the most frequently used electronic formats and, if possible, transfer such Personal Data to another service provider (rights to data portability);
PrivacyPolicy.item12-2-5: to revoke consent of the Data Subject to Processing of Personal Data.
PrivacyPolicy.item12-3: The rights of the Data Subject referred to in Clause 13.1 of the Privacy Policy shall be exercised insofar as the Processing of Personal Data does not arise from obligations of WAPI OÜ imposed on it by regulatory enactments.
PrivacyPolicy.item12-4: In order to prevent unjustified disclosure of a Data Subject's Personal Data to third parties, WAPI OÜ exercises rights of a Data Subject on the basis of a written application, having previously identified the Data Subject.
PrivacyPolicy.item12-5: Application can be submitted in one of the following ways (contact information of the respective WAPI OÜ is available on its website):
PrivacyPolicy.item12-5-1: by signing with a qualified secure electronic signature and sending it to the e-mail address of the respective WAPI OÜ;
PrivacyPolicy.item12-5-2: upon personal arrival at the office of the respective WAPI OÜ during its working hours and after verification of identity of the Data Subject performed by an employee of the WAPI OÜ, to submit the relevant application;
PrivacyPolicy.item12-5-3: by sending a written application to the legal address of the relevant WAPI OÜ, indicating in the application postal address to which a reply must be provided. The answer to such application will be provided only by registered mail, to the postal address indicated in application.
PrivacyPolicy.item12-6: Response to the Data Subject's request will be prepared no later than within one month after receipt of application; if necessary, for objective reasons, this period may be extended by further two months.
PrivacyPolicy.item12-7: In certain cases provided for in regulatory enactments, WAPI OÜ may not have the right to provide information to the Data Subject about processing of Personal Data.
PrivacyPolicy.item12-8: WAPI OÜ is entitled to refuse to comply with the requirements specified in the Data Subject's application if the Data Subject unreasonably refuses to provide his / her identifying information.
PrivacyPolicy.item12-9: WAPI OÜ reserves the right not to issue Personal Data, incl. Personal Data obtained during video surveillance in cases where such issuance:
PrivacyPolicy.item12-9-1: affect other Data Subjects and there would be no technical possibilities to issue Personal Data without infringing the rights of other Data Subjects;
PrivacyPolicy.item12-9-2: due to their size or complexity, they require excessive time, staff or financial resources.
PrivacyPolicy.item12-10: Data Subject may submit a complaint regarding Personal Data Processing performed by the respective WAPI OÜ to the Personal Data Protection Supervisory Authority of the country where the respective WAPI OÜ is registered, if the Data Subject considers that the Data Subject's Personal Data Processing violates the Data Subject's rights and interests in accordance with Personal Data Protection Acts.
PrivacyPolicy.item12-11: Contact information of Personal Data Protection supervisory authorities is available on their websites: Latvia - www.dvi.gov.lv, Lithuania - www.ada.lt, Estonia - www.aki.ee, Poland - www.uodo.gov.pl, Czech Republic - www.uoou.cz, Romania - www.dataprotection.ro, in Slovakia - www.dataprotection.gov.sk, in Slovenia - www.ip-rs.si, in Sweden - datainspektionen.se
PrivacyPolicy.item13-1_1: In case of doubt or for additional information regarding processing of Personal Data by WAPI OÜ, please contact WAPI OÜ by sending an e-mail to:
PrivacyPolicy.item14-1_1: WAPI OÜ is entitled to unilaterally make changes and additions to the Privacy Policy at any time by publishing the current version of the Privacy Policy on the WAPI OÜ website
PrivacyPolicy.item14-2: Privacy Policy is prepared in English and may be translated into other languages in accordance with the languages of the countries in which the WAPI OÜ do business.
PrivacyPolicy.validity: This document is valid as of 10th of May 2024.

CookiePolicy.text1-1: This Cookie Policy explains how we use cookies and similar tracking technologies when you visit our website
CookiePolicy.text1-2: . By continuing to browse the site, you are agreeing to our use of cookies as outlined in this policy.
CookiePolicy.text3: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and to provide information to website owners.
CookiePolicy.text5: We use cookies for the following purposes:

list.item1-text: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable you to navigate the website and use its features.
list.item2-text: These cookies are used to recognize you when you return to our website. This enables us to personalize our content for you, greet you by name, and remember your preferences (for example, your choice of language or region).
list.item3-text: These cookies collect information about how visitors use our website, such as which pages are visited most often. This information is aggregated and anonymous, and is used to improve the functionality of the website. We use Microsoft Clarity to help us understand how our users interact with our website.

CookiePolicy.identifyUser: Used to identify the user once logged in.
CookiePolicy.identifyUserStatus: Used to identify logged user status.
CookiePolicy.usersName: Stores user's name to display in UI.
CookiePolicy.uiTutorials: Stores information about UI tutorials user watched to not display these tutorials again.
CookiePolicy.navAccess: Stores logged user's navigation access info.
CookiePolicy.clickClarity: Used by Microsoft Clarity. Persists the Clarity User ID and preferences, unique to that site, on the browser. This ensures that behavior in subsequent visits to the same site will be attributed to the same user ID.
CookiePolicy.slskClarity: Used by Microsoft Clarity. Connects multiple page views by a user into a single Clarity session recording.
CookiePolicy.text8: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. Please revisit this page periodically to stay informed about our use of cookies.
CookiePolicy.text9: By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this Cookie Policy.

cookieConsent.text1: Utilizamos cookies para mejorar su experiencia en nuestro sitio. Revise nuestra política de cookies
